title: The Week of Valor: Xavier Brooks, the Vigilant Elder
summary: Xavier Brooks, age 78 and normally an instructor, unexpectedly gains superpowers and spends a week protecting his community and imparting wise lessons, culminating in an epic showdown that proves age is just a number when it comes to heroism.
summaryGerman: Xavier Brooks, 78 Jahre alt und normalerweise ein Lehrer, erhält unerwartet Superkräfte und verbringt eine Woche damit, seine Gemeinde zu schützen und weise Lektionen zu vermitteln, die in einem epischen Showdown gipfeln, der beweist, dass Alter nur eine Zahl ist, wenn es um Heldentum geht.
summaryDutch: Xavier Brooks, 78 jaar oud en normaal gesproken een instructeur, krijgt plotseling superkrachten en spendeert een week aan het beschermen van zijn gemeenschap en het geven van wijze lessen, uitmondend in een epische confrontatie die bewijst dat leeftijd slechts een nummer is wanneer het op heldendaden aankomt.
summaryFrench: Xavier Brooks, âgé de 78 ans et normalement instructeur, obtient soudainement des superpouvoirs et passe une semaine à protéger sa communauté et à dispenser des leçons de sagesse, aboutissant à un affrontement épique qui prouve que l'âge n'est qu'un nombre quand il s'agit de l'héroïsme.

story.text: In the quiet town of Willow Creek, Xavier Brooks, a retired teacher, enjoys his morning walk, reflecting on peaceful retirement days, unaware of the changes that the upcoming days would bring.

An eerie glow emanates from an ancient amulet Xavier finds hidden beneath a loose brick during his volunteer work at the local museum. As he touches it, a surge of energy flows through him, granting him unexpected powers.

Feeling unusually energetic, Xavier tests his newfound abilities. He discovers he can manipulate time! He uses these powers to avert minor accidents in the community, becoming a local whisper of a guardian.

Xavier, embracing his role as a protector, starts his day by stopping a potential bank robbery with a clever twist of time, saving countless lives and earning the secret nickname 'The Clockmaster' among the townspeople.
Despite his successes, Xavier feels a pang of loneliness as his secret distances him from his friends, who notice his absences but can't understand the reasons behind them.
A gentle, unexpected romance blooms when Xavier saves an old friend from a falling tree, rekindling a long-lost love who, in awe of Xavier's humility and power, sees him through new eyes.

In an epic finale, Xavier thwarts a major disaster—a dam break—using his powers to reverse the water flow, buying time for emergency services to secure the area. The town celebrates their unknown hero, his heart swells with pride and purpose.

ending: As the week closes, Xavier Brooks learns that true heroism comes in many forms, and that aging, indeed, does not diminish one's spirit or capacity to make a difference.
moral: No matter the age, one can always be a hero in their own right.
